title: Bug 67578Privileged Aspect Access Problem Across Packages
description: From Irum Godil's aspectjusers posting:package a;public class ITD {private void returnNothing(Object a) {}}package b;import a.;privileged aspect B {public void ITD.newFun() {returnNothing("a");}}returns:C:\devel\test\priv\b\B.aj:8 error The method returnNothing(Object) from thetype ITD is not visiblereturnNothing("a");^^^^^^1 errorWhich it should not (and AspectJ 1.0.6 does not give an error)Work around: use this.returnNothing("a");
